name: discord-js-handler-template
description: Discord.js Command and Event Handler Template with example Command usages!
author: sparkertech

changelog.1.74.0: Updated readme with gifs. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.73.0: Added missing path.basename and path.normalization for the pi instance. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.72.0: Added path normalization to functions that didnt have it before. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.71.0: Added a process lock for the message playback command in the minionBot to prevent unwanted idle skips. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.70.0: Changes to fix the pathing issues that remain on the pi. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.69.0: Fixes for image hosting on pi. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.68.0: Adjustments made to the audio resource creation and playback process. Fixes for the playback when encountering corrupted files. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.67.0: Changes to environment variables for the raspberry pi. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.66.0: Changes to linux mounting process for the raspberry pi. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.65.0: Attempt at setting custom status for the bot in the Discord guild. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.64.0: Added consideration of chapter and part edge cases when skipping +/- 15 seconds. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.63.0: Fixed more references to the old pathing scheme. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.62.0: More fixes for the new path configurations. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.61.0: Minor bug fixes for the new temp file mapping scheme. Some issues persist. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.60.0: Modified tempToOriginalMap to use filenames only. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.59.0: Finishing touches for the audible plus library and json timestamp cache. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.58.0: Minor improvements to the audible plus library catalog discord text chat. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.57.0: Added the python script for parsing the library title information. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.56.0: Added update interval for the new audible plus library catalog discord text chat. Fixed versioning. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.55.0: More bug fixes. Re-introduction of the smbService.js. Added a progress bar and cover image to the in-progress menu embeds. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.54.0: Bug fix for saving user positions ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.53.0: Introduction of seek to timestamp button for chapters. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.52.0: Fixes for bugs in saving user positions and progress bar ui ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.51.0: Began re-introducing the smbService.js ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.50.0: Improvements for playback and progress percentage calculations. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.49.0: Bug fixes for the new catalog browsing commands and message UIs ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.48.0: Improvements for the catalog UI, in progress % calculations are still bugged. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.47.0: Fix for in progress command when more than 5 books are being listened too. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.46.0: Re-introduced speed controls, and added fixes for the accurate chapter selects. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.45.0: Bug fixes for skip and back commands. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.44.0: Update to show proper chapter select and fix some bugs in the playback messages. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.43.0: Changes to attempt to remedy some bugs with the userPosition.json storage ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.42.0: Fixes for bugs and introduction of a stable playback UI that can be used to resume a playback of a book. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.41.0: Fixes for bugs introduced in the last update. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.40.0: Modified minion bot script to reuse messages when possible for users. Still buggy when trying to resume playback. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.39.0: Fix for the case sensitivity for title matches to user positions. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.38.0: Removed reference to local machine name. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.37.0: Added 2 more minion bots and a chapter select to the UI playback. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.36.0: Added code to reuse UI Seek playback messages instead of creating new ones when possible. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.35.0: Fix for the next and prev chapter bugs. Skip and back 10 second increment commands are still bugged. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.34.0: Update for the dvr ffmpeg audiobook service ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.33.0: Bug fix for resetting the update seek UI flag if an exception is thrown during the update. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.32.0: Bug fix for properly exiting the bots when a user leaves their channel. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.31.0: Moved sensitive paths and addresses to the .env process file for public facing repo purposes. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.30.0: First semi-stable version of the master bot and minion bot system. Bot is running 24/7 now. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.29.0: Changes to fix various bugs related to minion bot configuration. Committing before updating the bot. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.28.0: First working version of async playback. This version is a working version of the master bot and minion bot system. Some bugs persist. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.27.0: Changes that determined through debugging and testing that multiple async playbacks were not working as intended. The next steps will be to create node subprocesses for each minion bot. Then control these through interactions from the masterbot so that the discord.js/voice instances can be separated. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.26.0: More changes working towards the master bot and minion bot system. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.25.0: Changes to support turning the streamboibot into a master bot with minion bots for each playback instance. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.24.0: Initial changes to support multiple async audiobook playbacks in different channels for separate users ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.23.0: Speed improvements for audiobook processing. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.22.0: Re-placed the declaration for chapterNumber in the bot.js ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.21.0: Temporarily increasing the UI updates to 10 seconds to support the pi. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.20.0: Changes to improve the debouncing, and final commit before bot supports 24/7 operation. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.19.0: Small fixes for bot, more debouncing for UI updates. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.18.0: Added a debouncer to limit UI update processing. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.17.0: Small changes to support the bot on the pi. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.16.0: More small path changes for service support. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.15.0: Small changes for the service to support running on the host SMB device (pathing issues). ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.14.0: Added a service for the DVR pc to host the file manipulation and conversion controlled by an API consisting of gets and posts. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.13.0: Fixed the mounting of the SMB share in linux systems. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.12.0: Added mp3convert.py to DiscordBot utils in the repo with updates to the script too. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.11.0: Small change to detect os for mounting smb on windows or linux. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.10.0: Fixed bug when starting a new audiobook that would cause the search for the book to fail. Added user cache jsons to .gitignore. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.9.0: Improvements for the playback UI and images now show for the book covers. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.8.0: Fixed next chapter and previous chapter function and added UI buttons for skipping chapters. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.7.0: Further refinements for audiobook support. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.6.0: Fixed seek bar to be accurate, and fixed some playback bugs. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.5.0: Added various playback controls and created a playback UI for chat. Chapter skipping/reversing and 10 second skips are buggy. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.4.0: Ammending and forcing commit over last v1.4.0. This commit has functional code for audiobook support. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.3.0: Intermediate commit for audiobook support.  ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.2.0: Began implementing audiobook support ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.1.0: Minor improvements to support live stream service ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.0.0: Initial commit to LiveStreamService project with interface and service.ts base files created. ~ Sean Parker
